name: PostAcuteOrChronicCOVID_19SyndromeDisordersSNOMED
title: Post acute or Chronic COVID_19 Syndrome (Disorders) (SNOMED)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has post acute or chronic conditions of COVID-19 regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: Post-acute or chronic conditions of coronavirus 2),(Exclusion Criteria: NA)
